author: Not available

text.0: Sie ðæt la on eorðan      ælces ðinges
text.1: gesælig mon,      gif he gesion mæge
text.10: on ðone ecan eard      ussa saula.
text.4: and of him selfum      ðone sweartan mist,
text.6: We sculon ðeah gita      mid godes fylste
text.8: betan bispellum,      þæt ðu ðe bet mæge

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
